cu.explanation_en: Modified local_s_address to '192.168.70.256', which is an invalid IP address (octet 256 > 255), causing unreachable local SCTP address and routing misconfiguration in CU.

du.explanation_en: Modified absoluteFrequencySSB to 10000000, which is out of the valid frequency range for NR band 78, causing frequency misalignment and SSB configuration rejection in DU.
